dcterms:creator: R. Mamidi
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 518 advertisements released by Amul, with 333 identified as puns, including 121 code-mixed puns. The dataset was annotated by three native Hindi speakers who identified pun locations and targets.
dcterms:title: Amul Advertisements Dataset

dcterms:creator: Kanika Gupta
Monojit Choudhury
Kalika Bali
dcterms:description: A dataset of Hindi-English transliteration pairs mined from online Hindi lyrics, used for language identification in the context of code-mixed puns.
dcterms:title: Hindi-English Transliteration Pairs

dcterms:creator: Steven Bird
Ewan Klein
Edward Loper
dcterms:description: An English language dictionary used for language identification in the context of code-mixed puns, built from news data collected from a leading Indian newspaper.
dcterms:title: English Language Dictionary

dcterms:creator: Anoop Kunchukuttan
Pratik Mehta
Pushpak Bhattacharyya
dcterms:description: A dataset of Hindi monolingual data used to build language models for Hindi in the context of code-mixed puns.
dcterms:title: Hindi Monolingual Data
